/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling scene on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the road below. The highway, divided by a concrete barrier, stretches out into the distance, flanked by lush green trees on one side and towering buildings on the other. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. Cars can be seen moving along the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static landscape. The image is bathed in natural light, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
